title: Application of the theory of planned behavior to model the intention and behavior of tomato growers in pesticide exposure
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Amin Pirmoghni, B. Shahmoradi, P. Taymoori, Asghar Bagheri, Parisa Nasrollahi, Zhino Karimi, Farough Mohammadian, Naier Emami, H.J. Choi
